nodes.text: Sposia was a planet located in Chiss Space's Sposia system. The hyperlane known as the Path of the Houses linked it to the Csilla and Naporar systems. Sposia was home to House Sabosen, one of the Ruling Families of the sentient Chiss species, and it was the site of the Chiss Ascendancy's top academies and medcenters.
Sposia was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square E-8.
